title: Interpretation of a dream about fishing

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing fishing in a dream The dream of a fisherman with details is one of the visions that many people have and wonder about its effects on earth, so they resort to interpretation books that included all the interpretations related to these visions to ensure that they are visions or dreams worthy of praise. You may also be interested in knowing about Friday in A dream, which indicates its impact on risks and dangers, and so that people stop searching for the meaning of this vision in researching machines, we will clarify all the evidence that has been developed for this vision from the point of view of senior scholars. Seeing hunting in a dream is evidence of persecution by some of the dreamer, especially with regard to women. The hunter in a dream is the pillars of a deceiver, because the origin of hunting is based on the deception of the unjust. A bird hunter in a dream is evidence of the existence of a deceiver, whether the dreamer or anyone else who sees him. Interpretation of seeing hunting in a dream. Interpretation of seeing hunting in a dream, the hunter’s dream in detail, because hunting is one of the wonderful hobbies that one resorts to. Many in order to have fun and isolate themselves from the world, the interpretation of seeing fishing in a dream in a fisherman’s dream in detail is what most people think about this hobby and what it has. The interpretation is as follows: Scientists say that if we see the hobby of fishing in a dream, then this vision indicates jihad and perseverance to earn a legitimate livelihood, and God knows best. As for the one who sees in his dream that he is working in the fishing profession, the interpretation of this vision, according to the opinion of senior commentators, is evidence of the abundance of goodness that He is approaching the dreamer. Among the indications that have been given for seeing rabbits fishing in a dream is that they indicate that the dreamer is approaching marriage or intercourse, and God knows best. If a person sees a fishing net in a dream filled with fish of different types and sizes, then this vision indicates stability and abundance. Food is in the dreamer’s life, and God knows best. Seeing fishing with a net in a dream means repentance for sins and returning to the Lord of the Worlds. You may also be interested in knowing: The colored thread in the dream. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the vision of fishing. Ibn Sirin is famous for his ability to interpret various visions in a simple scientific style that suits the mentality of ordinary people Therefore, we will learn about the interpretation given by Ibn Sirin to explain the vision of hunting in a dream, and his dream in detail. Fisherman: Ibn Sirin believes that the dream of fishing is one of the thankful dreams that indicates kindness and taking advantage of enemies despite their cunning, and God knows best. But when a person sees that he is catching a group of tilapia fish by hand, then this vision, according to Ibn Sirin, indicates success and the fulfillment of dreams and aspirations. Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of seeing fishing in a dream in detail. A dream about a fisherman, especially a fisherman who catches birds, indicates the good qualities that the dreamer has and that he is a wise and intelligent person. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing him fishing in the sea is evidence of his abundant strength and his earning a lot of money and profit from it. His work, and God knows best. You may also be interested in knowing: Apples in a dream Interpretation of a dream about fishing in one dream Interpretation of seeing fishing in a dream, a dream about a fisherman in detailIn this paragraph n

title: Interpretation of a dream about a big snake and a small snake in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a large snake and a small snake in a dream. The snake is an animal and has a frightening shape and appearance. It can cause insomnia and anxiety when you see it in a dream. You may be interested in meeting the dead father in a dream. The person who dreams, and it can indicate disputes and disputes, and in this article we will look at seeing the large snake. And the small one in a dream is on the summit site. Interpretation of seeing a large snake in a dream: It indicates the presence of evil people and envy of the Lord. Interpretation of a dream about a large snake attacking me. It indicates many problems facing the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream of a snake chasing me in the house indicates haters and envious people who may be relatives or friends. Interpretation of dreams of a snake chasing me and I am afraid of a man. It indicates his wife’s enemies or her illness. Read also: Seeing a promise in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a snake for a man. Interpretation of seeing a large snake and a small snake in a dream. If one sees a snake in a dream, this means enemies and friends who harbor hostility, hatred, and hypocrites. Seeing a snake In a married man’s dream, it indicates many problems, experiences, and obstacles. Seeing a large snake in the dream of a divorced or widowed man indicates the presence of an enemy lurking around him, and the black snake indicates the presence of a very evil person conspiring against the dreamer. If a young man sees the black snake, the vision shows pitfalls and obstacles. Which he faces in his life’s journey. Read also: Backgrounds in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a married man and his killer about a snake. A snake in a dream indicates crises, tribulations, and obstacles in life and can indicate a difficult, malicious, and jealous life. Seeing killing a snake means getting rid of troubles and problems, and seeing killing it by cutting the snake into Small pieces may indicate marital problems and arguments leading to separation and divorce. Seeing a snake cut into three pieces indicates that the husband will divorce three times irrevocably, so you must pay attention to that and not let the disputes take a more serious course and resort to God until these problems end and the quarrels and afflictions end. . Married life is settled. The vision may indicate a person who is very hostile to him. Read also: Holding a friend’s hand in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a little snake and then killing a married woman. If you see a snake in a dream of a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or a widow, this indicates the presence of enemies hiding In plain sight. Seeing a small snake indicates enemies who are trying to ruin her life, so keep that in mind and do not listen to haters and envious people, do not reveal the secrets of her home, and do not talk about her private life in front of others. You may also be interested in knowing: The accident in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a snake bite And the release of poison. Snake bites can indicate the presence of a lot of money. Snake bites can indicate bad friends. This vision may indicate disasters that this person is exposed to and then he is liberated. Read also: Seeing pins in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a snake bite for a married woman. A snake bite indicates for a woman A married or pregnant woman indicates instability and tension in her life. A snake bite in a married woman’s dream indicates

title: Interpretation of seeing a stranger enter you in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a strange man entering you in a dream, the appearance of strangers in a dream is one of the confusing dreams that prompt the dreamer to search for an interpretation. The people were ordinary and the dreamer felt accepted towards them, so it is a promising dream, so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of a strange man entering you in a dream Interpretation of a dream of seeing a girl in a dream about a man Seeing a man in a dream of a girl or a woman indicates the presence of a specific message for the dreamer, that is, seeing a doctor in a dream indicates recovery from illness, and seeing a teacher is a sign of success and excellence in studying, and the interpretation of a man's dream generally differs in a girl's dream according to the beauty of the man. His name and title, that is, if the man is handsome and carries a great name and title, this indicates all the good and good meanings for the dreamer, but if the man is the opposite, this means that the dream carries evil. For insight. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a strange man sleeping for a single woman Dream interpreters confirmed that seeing men in general in women's dreams is a sign of good luck and wealth. Therefore, dreaming of an unmarried girl with a strange man is a sign of the joy that she will feel soon, and often the news of her engagement to a good man, and this dream is for an unmarried woman. An indication of the tremendous good that she has achieved in various aspects of her life and the great success that the owner of the vision has achieved, whether in her field of work and in her studies or in general in the interpretation of seeing a man in a dream has positive meanings and good interpretations, especially if the man is handsome, and the interpreters confirmed that the dreams in which an unmarried girl sees a man named Muhammad, Ahmed or Mahmoud indicate the tremendous good, great wealth and great livelihood that will come to her after the distress. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a stranger entering a married woman Dream interpreters confirmed that a married woman seeing a strange man entering her, or a man seeing a married woman in general, is an indication of a happy year full of gifts and abundant sustenance. It is also an indication of exhaustion, laziness and tension. As for the wife who sees her husband's sadness or anger, this indicates the great difficulty she faces in finding money. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a famous man in a dream The interpretation of seeing a famous man in a dream varies according to the dreamer's social status, and the most important disagreement about this vision can be traced through the following: Seeing a famous man in a dream for a married woman indicates the collapse of marital problems and disputes between her and her husband. It is also a sign of approaching Aries in case he wants to get pregnant, and an indication of a wide range of nutrition and eliminating material problems in case of financial problems. A pregnant woman who sees a famous man in a dream, especially if he is good-looking and handsome, is a sign of her successful pregnancy without hardship and fatigue, a quick and easy birth without problems, and a beautiful and healthy newborn. Seeing a famous man in an unmarried girl's dream indicates her acquaintance with a righteous man of religion and morals who is engaged to her. The dream also indicates marriage to a good man and a happy, peaceful and stable married life.

After the tribulation.Interpretation of a dream about seeing a stranger entering a married woman. Dream interpreters have confirmed that a married woman seeing a strange man entering her, or a man seeing a married woman in general, is an indication of a happy year full of gifts and abundance of sustenance. It is also an indicator of fatigue, laziness and stress. As for the wife who sees her husband sad or angry, this indicates the great difficulty she faces in finding money. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a famous man in a dream The interpretation of seeing a famous man in a dream varies depending on the social status of the dreamer, and the most important disagreement over this vision can be traced through the following: Seeing a famous man in a dream for a married woman indicates the collapse of marital problems and disagreements between her and her husband. It is also a sign of approaching Aries in the event that he wants to become pregnant, and an indicator of a wide range of nutrition and the elimination of material problems in the case of financial problems. A pregnant woman who sees a famous man in a dream, especially if he is good-looking and handsome, is a sign of her successful pregnancy Without hardship and exhaustion, a quick and easy birth without problems, and a beautiful, healthy newborn. Seeing a famous man in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates her acquaintance with a good man of religion and morals and he is engaged to her. The dream also indicates marriage to a good man and a happy, peaceful and stable married life.T

title: What if I dreamed of a cat?  What is Ibn Sirin?  Its interpretation is: I dreamed of a brown cat, and its interpretation is: I dreamed of a gray cat

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a cat: Seeing a cat expresses many different and different meanings. The cat in particular can symbolize something and its opposite, which is why translators’ books are filled with more than one interpretation of this vision, and this vision varies according to many. Things, including the color of the cat and the body that appears on it, and the way a person deals with it, chasing it or killing it or vice versa, and what is the significance of biting a cat or seeing it giving birth or talking, and in this article we will study all the details and repercussions of this vision in order to know this issue from every point of view. Look.I dreamed of a catIf someone says that I dreamed of a cat, this indicates a tendency towards independence and getting rid of the restrictions that prevent him from achieving his goals, the desire to show creativity and the ability to somehow break any obstacle and try to prevent him from reaching his goal. Seeing a cat represents the love and services provided to the individual, and the opportunities available to him, but they are opportunities that have fangs, as the person did not confront them and exploit them in the correct way. Ibn Shaheen believes in his interpretation of seeing the cat that it symbolizes bad luck, many worries and sorrow, and a constant feeling of confusion between the available options. It is difficult to obtain a correct perspective on the events that the viewer is experiencing and disturb the peace of mind. From life. And if he sees cat meat, it symbolizes the money that one earns from illegal sources, as one eats forbidden food without remorse or repentance, and this money may come from theft or thief. It is said that the cat expresses the woman who enchants people and mesmerizes herself. And she does things that do not fit the norm. She likes to show off and tries to attract attention. Seeing a cat also indicates some obnoxious traits, such as refusing services, not giving people their natural rights, cruelty and rudeness in romantic relationships, and a tendency to watch others and try to violate privacy unfairly. The vision can indicate disagreements that gradually turn into a rupture, and then over time turn into a sharp, unpleasant conflict that results in many negative results that harm all parties, whether in money and work, or in severing relations, psychological defeat and a blow. Declining morale. Seeing a cat also expresses a person who perseveres and tries thousands of times to reach his goal, does not care about the accusations or obstacles that the person puts in his way and remains committed to the goal he wants to reach. But he may resort to unknown and illegal methods to achieve his goal and purpose. If the dreamer sees that he is afraid of a cat, this indicates his anxiety about the thoughts in which the person is with a woman, such as the idea of ​​marriage or emotional attachment, which disturbs his sleep and occupies his mind. Confidence may be lacking in women. If the cat expresses the spirit of independence, then the shapeless cat symbolizes the difficulty of achieving this goal of independence, and the problems that the person faces due to his legal requirements and his complete inability to achieve complete control over the current situation. I dreamed of a cat by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of seeing a cat in a dream. That the vision represents theft and robbery

title: Interpretation of a restaurant in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In the context of dream interpretation, we present to you the interpretation of a restaurant in a dream by Ibn Sirin. A restaurant is a place that is specially designed to serve meals and people go to it with the intention of buying and eating various meals and spending an enjoyable time in this place. Some people may see in their dreams that they visit restaurants and do not know whether they are... This vision has meaning and significance or is it just a dream, so people turn to dream interpretation scholars to interpret their visions. Interpretation of a restaurant in a dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that if the sleeper dreams of famous restaurants that serve cheap meals, this is a sign of peace and tranquility in the dreamer’s life. It may indicate Seeing a restaurant in a dream indicates the job that the dreamer will get in the coming days, but he will not be able to get money from this job. If the sleeper sees that he is in a disorganized and ugly restaurant, this is a sign of the problems that the dreamer will face in his life. And if the dreamer Dreaming that he is eating in a very cramped restaurant, this is a sign of the financial crisis that the dreamer is going through. Seeing buying a restaurant in a dream is a good vision that indicates abundant livelihood and profit. Seeing a restaurant manager in a dream means happy events and wonderful food that the dreamer will receive. Interpretation of a dream about sitting in A restaurant for singles: Seeing a single girl in her dream sitting in a large, spacious, and beautiful restaurant is a good vision and indicates hearing news that will bring joy to her heart. Seeing a restaurant full of people in a single girl’s dream shows her loneliness in life. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is eating a meal In a restaurant and the meal was delicious, this is a sign of the great livelihood that you will obtain, and this livelihood may be a new job. For an unmarried girl to see in a dream that she is eating food in a restaurant, feeding a man from her plate and sharing her meal with him, this indicates the date of her approaching marriage. Interpretation Dream of a restaurant in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she is going to buy a very large restaurant, this is a sign that she will have a lot of money in the near future. If a married woman dreams that she is preparing meals in the restaurant, this means that she is satisfied with her life with her husband and family. Dream A married woman’s husband working in a restaurant is a good and praiseworthy dream and may indicate that her husband is a good man who loves her and seeks her satisfaction. If a married woman sees in her dream that her husband owns a restaurant, this is a sign of her husband being promoted to a better job. Interpretation of a dream about a restaurant in a dream for a woman Pregnant: If a pregnant woman dreams in a dream that she is eating a meal in a large, luxurious restaurant, serving delicious meals, this is a sign that she will give birth easily. Seeing an organized and tidy restaurant in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that her fetus is in good health and that God will grant her a healthy child free of diseases. Interpretation of a restaurant In a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is visiting a restaurant and orders many meals while she is in a state of extreme hunger, and one of the workers brought the meals and ate a lot until she was full, then this is an indication that God Almighty will grant her peace and comfort.

title: Interpretation of a dream about Imam al-Sadiq’s ring

preview.html: Interpretation of the letter Kha in a dream for Imam al-Sadiq via our website. Pegs, cucumbers, seals, vinegar, and many other symbols that begin with the letter kha. We will provide interpretations related to these in the next article. Seeing a seal in a dream can bring another sign, which is the death of a position or authority. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream. title: Learn the interpretation of crying out loud in a dream from Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of crying and screaming in a dream, and the interpretation of a dream about crying out loud for a dead person.

preview.html: What is the interpretation of intense crying in a dream? Interpretation of crying in a dream: It is not evangelistic, especially if the dreamer cries while crying, and feels very sad, and jurists have developed multiple interpretations of this symbol, which you will learn about in detail in the following article. Interpretation of crying in a dream: Whoever sees that he is crying profusely, tearing his clothes, and screaming High in his sleep, he is about to fall into many disappointments, shocks, and sorrows as follows: Whether or not: If the dreamer hears in his dream news that makes him slap and feel very sad, this means that he will soon receive bad news about important aspects of his life. Second: This scene suggests With death and a feeling of loneliness after the dreamer lost a loved one in reality. Third: If the dreamer sees himself crying in the workplace, the sorrows he faces will be related to his professional career. Fourth: The student who saw that he is carrying one of his textbooks and crying loudly, will be stressed in His academic life and he does not want to continue his academic journey, and the dream may alert him that he is failing or receiving unsatisfactory grades, which makes him miserable and sad. For a period of time. Fifth: If the merchant sees himself standing in his store crying and being slapped, this indicates many financial failures that he is experiencing or losing a big deal in which he had high commercial hopes in his life. Interpretation of crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Heavy crying in a dream Ibn Sirin is not good in its meaning and causes anxiety, and there are other symbols in this scene that, if the dreamer sees them, confirm the cruelty of his coming life and he must be careful, and it is so. The following: Or not: If the dreamer cries violently and sees his clothes are weak and his bag is empty of money, then this is interpreted as loss and confusion, and the vision indicates that he is suffering from a lack of money and a distressed situation. Second: If he cries and finds drops of blood in his house and he does not know where it came from. Did that blood come? This indicates that someone is hurting him badly and that the misfortunes that will attack him in his life will never be easy. Third: If the dreamer is robbed and continues to cry bitterly over the money he lost because it was important to him, then the dream warns him of material decline and the presence of enemies. Fourth: If the dreamer's house is burning and he stands in front of him crying loudly, then the dream warns him that he will lose something valuable. Fifth: If the symbol of a scorpion, or a spider or a snake, appears in the dream, and the dreamer cries so much out of fear that he screams loudly and asks people for help. To get rid of their violent bites, it is interpreted as a strong enemy and he intends to harm him and will approach him in reality. This will greatly frighten the dreamer, even if he is bitten by these poisonous insects and reptiles, and he continues to cry from the force of the bite. If the dreamer cries and sees many tears falling from his eyes, knowing that these tears were inflamed and caused minor burns on his face, this is a strong shock. Extreme sadness makes him suffer for long periods of time and may do something terrible. And repentance from it, and the sorrows that befall it are due to sadness and remorse. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams.

title: Interpretation of a dream about hearing ears in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of hearing the call to prayer in a dream or a dream and what the meaning of the call to prayer in prayer in detail. The call is God’s call to His servants to perform prayer, and to remind the believers to pray, and it is called the call five times a day for every prayer imposed on Muslims, which is what scholars and imams said in the interpretation of dreams: The call to prayer or the muezzin differs from one person to another depending on the waking state of the person having the vision; Hearing the call to prayer can be a sign of piety and faith, it can be evidence of disobedience and corruption and in conclusion. Warning to stay away from our Lord Almighty. Ibn Sirin discussed the different interpretations of hearing the call to prayer in a dream and its circumstances. Interpretation of seeing the call to prayer in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If a man sees that he is calling for the butterfly prayer, this indicates that he underestimates his wife and children. Seeing a man calling the call to prayer in an unknown place indicates the man’s mistake and recklessness or that he has stolen. Halal money in the same year. If a man sees that he is calling to prayer in the middle of his house, this indicates the death of a relative or close relative and may refer to a son or sister. Interpretation of seeing the call to prayer for a single woman in a dream. If a girl sees that she hears the call to prayer and prays, this indicates success and success in Her life. Seeing a call to prayer at home in a dream for unmarried people means reconciliation between the two parties and the end of the accusation. Seeing the call to prayer at the door of the king or sultan indicates honesty and truth and avoiding gossip, gossip and lies. Interpretation of seeing the call for a married woman in a dream. If a married woman sees in her dream an invitation to prayer and residence. , this means that she hears good news. Seeing the call to prayer in a married woman’s prayer shows her high status and elevation. Seeing the call to prayer in a married woman’s dream indicates her husband’s promotion and their livelihood. Interpretation of seeing the call to prayer for a divorced woman in a dream If a divorced woman or a widow sees a muezzin above the minaret, she is given an indication of her majesty. And its distinguished status. Seeing the sound of the call to prayer and the iqama in the dream of a divorced or widowed woman indicates the disappearance of tension and pain and the fulfillment of her desires. Interpretation of seeing the call to prayer for a pregnant woman in a dream. Seeing the call to prayer in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates ease of childbirth and relief from anxiety and sadness. Seeing the call to prayer in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that The birth of a good son will be wonderful when he grows up. Interpretation of seeing the call to prayer for a man in a dream. If a man sees that he is calling for prayer on the roof, this may indicate his acquaintance with a woman, his interest in her, and his exposure to her. If one sees that he is praying for a beast like a donkey, this indicates his travels. If he sees The same person in a dream says “Allahu Akbar” and prays on Eid, as this indicates the strength of religion and the glory of God’s rituals. Seeing the call to prayer in a man’s dream may indicate Hajj or it may indicate theft. Interpretation of raising the call to prayer in a dream. If it is permitted in Islamic countries, it indicates the presence of a spy spying. Against Muslims and spreading his unrest among the people. Whoever sees in a dream that he is calling for prayer and does not respond to anyone’s call, this indicates that he lives in the place of his people, unjustly and far from Islam. And whoever calls for prayer on the roof of a neighbor, this indicates betrayal of that neighbor and

And whoever calls for prayer on the roof of a neighbor, this indicates betrayal of that neighbor and

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing pumpkins in a dream?

preview.html: Zucchini in dreams Zucchini is one of the plants that we meet in the summer, and because it contains a large percentage of sugar, it is classified as a fruit. Some may see zucchini in their dreams and begin searching for an explanation for that. The dream and the consequences of seeing pumpkins, but the interpretation of a dream about pumpkins differs from one person to another, and in this article we will explain to you the interpretation of a dream about pumpkins in all its types and shapes. What is the interpretation of seeing pumpkins in a dream? Pumpkins in a dream have many connotations, which generally indicate guidance and piety, and are a sign of getting rid of anxiety. Anxiety, sadness, and a sign of the presence of a strong and strict man in the dreamer’s life. Her vision also shows a moral, kind man, characterized by faith and honesty, and translates to earning livelihood and money in the near future from toil and fatigue. Green pumpkins are an indication that the fortuneteller will receive a lot of money in the period Coming and also indicates an improvement in life and health and promises good news for excellence and success in a task or project. Buying green zucchini is a sign of nutrition and improvement of health, psychological and material condition. It also indicates recovery if the dreamer is suffering from an illness, so buying it in a dream seems good. In general, if it is fresh. When you see a damaged pumpkin in a dream, this is evidence of the dreamer’s stress and fatigue, and indicates losses in money and a decline in the field of work, as well as an indication of the presence of hypocritical people. In the dreamer. A life that can lead to a feeling of psychological exhaustion and frustration. The interpretation of seeing a stuffed pumpkin in a dream, especially if it appears in the dream in an appetizing form, is an indication of obtaining abundant money and following a great diet, and if it appears in an inedible form, it means losing money. . , or the dreamer is going through bad health conditions. To see the pumpkins cooked indicates abundant money and useful knowledge, especially if the number of pumpkins is large and it also shows the success of the fortuneteller’s work, but in the case of many spices in the pumpkins, this can lead to many problems, Worries and exaggeration of feelings and emotions and the way the dreamer tells stories. Buying spoiled pumpkins in a dream indicates unpleasant and bad relationships with those around the viewer due to his misbehavior with them and indicates material losses in the viewer’s projects or work and can be a sign of despair, disappointment and disillusionment. Interpretation Pumpkins in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing zucchini in a dream means kindness and nourishment. Eating cooked pumpkin indicates the sincere love that exists between the dreamer and his wife, or with his friends, or with his family, as well as a sign of stability in work, living, and marital life, and the dreamer’s feeling of happiness in his following days. Eating a pumpkin raw indicates haste and recklessness in making a decision, which causes remorse and psychological exhaustion, so the vision is a warning to the viewer of the need to be well aware of the dimensions of consent before implementing it. What is the interpretation of seeing pumpkins in a dream for a single woman? Interpretation of seeing pumpkins in a dream A dream for a single woman if she appears...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a short skirt: seeing wearing a short skirt in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a short skirt in a dream shows the dreamer’s status in life and other interpretations, and we will interpret this for a single, married, pregnant, or divorced girl, such as wearing a short black skirt, wearing a red, white, blue, or green skirt, or losing a torn, clean, dirty, or old skirt. Or new. Ibn Sirin and others in: Interpretation of a short skirt in a dream. Seeing a short skirt in a dream indicates weak morals in the visionary and weak adherence to his principles and values. See also: The short skirt in a dream often indicates the dreamer’s state in life, whether he is living happily or sadly, and seeing the short skirt In a dream, it indicates acts of worship and performing them, as well as indicating money and the lack thereof. Wearing a short skirt, whenever it is shorter than a man’s middle, whether for a girl, married or pregnant, is evidence of something undesirable in public, even if they are relatives other than the husband. A skirt can indicate Short hair in a dream indicates poverty, distance from worship, indulging in forbidden things, or vain lust. Interpreters stated that clothing in general is a sign of goodness, livelihood, religion, justice, and high status, unless it is dirty or torn. If the skirt is red, then this It indicates the feelings and emotions of the viewer, whether she is a virgin, married or pregnant. The shorter it is, the feeling of remorse, separation from a loved one, or blaming oneself for a previous act, the more serious and greater it is. The black color of the skirt indicates the relationships and family around the fortuneteller and his relationship with them in terms of affection, distance from them, quarrels, and disagreements. Seeing his skirt in white It is a sign of the hearts and feelings of those who may be seen as good, frustrated, or hurt by gossip, trouble, and hatred. Seeing a short skirt in blue indicates unhappiness in life, because blue is one of the colors of the seas and skies of the world, and the green color in it indicates lack. Money, food, and clothes because of its association with plants and food. In the event that a short skirt is worn in a private and individual place, or in front of the husband, or among women only in a dream, it is said that it indicates distress of joy, whether for the one who sees it or for herself. Around it, and it may indicate marriage, childbirth, or pregnancy, or it may be an offer and kindness. If it is dirty or torn in the dream, it represents separation and major problems, and it may indicate a severe illness if it is short. The extent to which it is possible to reveal nudity, which is forbidden to appear among women. Interpretation of wearing a short skirt in a dream: Seeing wearing a short skirt in a dream indicates achieving goodness, beauty, peace of mind, and security. It also expresses acceptance of the supplication of the person who had the vision, and the vision is also an indication that his work will do well. And that his profits will increase and his debts and diseases will end as well. The vision of wearing a short skirt in a dream shows doing beautiful works with good people, and the dreamer means that he will be a successful person in this work and participate in lawful living. The vision of a short skirt indicates that the person

It also expresses acceptance of the supplication of the person who had the vision, and the vision is also an indication that his work will do well. And that his profits will increase and his debts and diseases will end as well. The vision of wearing a short skirt in a dream shows doing beautiful works with good people, and the dreamer means that he will be a successful person in this work and participate in lawful living.
